pkgmetadata.longdescription: Feature Identification Between Metabolome and Microbiome in Disease and Health // A strategy that provides the identification of metabolome and microbiome (Bi-omics) feature. It is able to screen out key/driving features (metabolites, microbes, and pathway functions) by an integrated importance score (IIS),combining sub-scores derived from difference, correlation, abundance, and network analysis. It is able to identify microbe-function-metabolite chains and to rank association pairs within specific functions.
